name: A sound wizard
description:
Journal entry - shoot day 8
"We spent all day in Sergio's studio watching the Rushes. Beauty complied inside a wash of indulgence. The day with Lulu and Sid on mushrooms lost us. Watching back was a trip in itself. Incoherence. Beautiful lost incoherence, but so sure of itself. We finished at 4 am tangled inside the ropes of a needled field, Chinatown park".

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

3/10
